Your intelligent companion

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ALPHA 1E” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_12.png” image_as_background=”off” image_alignment=”center” button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjgzIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#474747″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#6B6B6B” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

The intelligent programmable education robot

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][/dsm_card_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|30px|20px|30px|true|true”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”none” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_1.png” title_text=”Premium_Robots_1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self:center;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#474747″ text_font_size=”17px” text_letter_spacing=”1px” header_text_color=”#474747″ header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px|20px|20px|20px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”17px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

GLOBAL LEADER IN HUMANOID ROBOTS

UBTECH leads the efforts in advancing humanoid and bipedal robotics. In the last ten years, UBTECH has performed ground-breaking research in robotic gait-planning and proprietary advancements in servo motor functionality that allow robots to walk and move like humans with accurate balance and stability.

These humanoid robots not only walk but they can perform actions like karate, yoga and the latest dance moves as well. With precise, fluid motion and tech forward designs, UBTECH Robotics aims to bring consumers products like these to homes everywhere.

To learn more, read below and click through to specific product pages.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#474747″ custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”25px||25px||false|true” custom_padding_phone=”20px|30px|20px|30px|true|true”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1600px” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”30px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

PROPRIETARY TECH DRIVES EXCEPTIONAL VALUE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”none” custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true”][et_pb_blurb title=”Robotic Servo Motors” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_2.png” icon_placement=”left” image_max_width=”200px” content_max_width=”1100px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”30px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_enable_color=”off” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

The UBTECH digital servos included in Premium Robots are state-of-the-art, proprietary hardware that creates precise and fluid motions that imitate joints.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Microphone and Speaker Integration” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_3.png” icon_placement=”left” image_max_width=”200px” content_max_width=”1100px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”30px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_enable_color=”off” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Rich, voice-activated capabilities, digital microphone array(s) and combined with premium speaker functionality create the ultimate audio hub within the robot.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1600px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”none” custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true”][et_pb_blurb title=”Integrated Sensor Technology” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_4.png” icon_placement=”left” image_max_width=”200px” content_max_width=”1100px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”30px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_enable_color=”off” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Sensor technology in the premium robots have the capacity to react to users and the environment it is in. Our integrated sensors allow the robots to respond, detect, activate and control within the home, making the day to day life easier and more functional.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Motion Control” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_5.png” icon_placement=”left” image_max_width=”200px” content_max_width=”1100px” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”30px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_enable_color=”off” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

UBTECH is the leader in creating technology around advancements in gait planning of biped robots. This ability to create robots that walk along with directional navigation, target tracking, and motion coordination in compact forms.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#D6D6D6″ THE INTELLIGENT, PROGRAMMABLE EDUCATION ROBOT

UPDATED FUNCTIONALITY

  • Alpha 1E adds functionality like an extensible sensor slot for customization and an IR sensor for obstacle detection

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ALPHA 1E” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_10.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”LEARN MORE” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjgzIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

THE INTELLIGENT, PROGRAMMABLE EDUCATION ROBOT

INTERACTIVE COMMUNICATION

  • Use programmable voice commands to command or communicate with the robot in the home
  • Alpha 1E can tell stories and play music with its quality microphone and speaker capabilities

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ALPHA 1E” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_11.png” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”LEARN MORE” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjgzIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

THE INTELLIGENT, PROGRAMMABLE EDUCATION ROBOT

LEARNING BECOMES FUN

  • With programming capabilities, Alpha 1E can teach PRP (Pose, Record, Play) functionality from the companion app

YOUR INTELLIGENT COMPANION

CUSTOMIZABLE SKILLS

  • Computer Vision with facial, object, and image recognition
  • Home Hub Functionality with ability to control, work, and be the home hub center of your Smart Home

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ALPHA MINI” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_7.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”LEARN MORE” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjc2In19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

YOUR INTELLIGENT COMPANION

ADVANCED MOTION CONTROL

  • Ability to walk, balance, dance, and even do yoga with the dynamic balance system

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ALPHA MINI” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Premium_Robots_8.png” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”LEARN MORE” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjc2In19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

YOUR INTELLIGENT COMPANION

OPEN API

  • Current functionality based on regional robot needs, Alpha Mini is built with an open API to customize and assist in further development of building AI skills

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][/dsm_card_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Your intelligent companion
